# Electron profile

Electron configuration file functionality.

---

## Objects

### Profile

The profile loaded.

```typescript
// Get data
let name = profile.get('name');
let email = profile.get('contact.email');

// Set data
profile.set('contact.phone', 1380000000);

// Remove data
profile.remove('contact.email');

// Save data
profile.save();

// Reload data
profile.reload();
```

---

## Browser Process & Renderer Process

---

### profile.load(file)

- `file`: (`string`) Profile path

```typescript
profile.load('profile://local/user.json');
```

---

## Browser Process

---

### profile.register(type, path)

- `type`: (`string`) Protocol name
- `path`: (`string`) Path to which the protocol points

Register a protocol address.

```typescript
profile.register('local', '~/local/');
```

---

### profile.query(type)

- `type`: (`string`) Protocol name

Query an address for a protocol.

```typescript
profile.query('local');
```

---

### profile.clear()

Clear all protocol addresses and inheritance relationships.

```typescript
profile.clear()
```

---

### profile.inherit(type, [parentType])

- `type`: (`string`) Protocol name
- `parentType`: (`string`) Inherit from the parent protocol. If the data is not found, it will continue to look for it in the parent protocol data.

Set or query a protocol inheritance chain.

```typescript
profile.inherit('local');
profile.inherit('local', 'global');
```

---
